item.title: By: brendan
item.dc:creator: brendan
item.description: I made these last night and they were awesome , ive got a mighty sweet tooth and was craving brownies, thanks for the recipe !
item.content:encoded: I made these last night and they were awesome , ive got a mighty sweet tooth and was craving brownies, thanks for the recipe !

item.title: By: Anita
item.dc:creator: Anita
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/easy-chocolate-brownies/comment-page-1/#comment-3006">Jan</a>.
Hi Jan These absolutely work when halved. I always make two trays worth, so I've put the doubled amount in so I don't have to double everything while I'm baking :)
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Jan.

Hi Jan
These absolutely work when halved. I always make two trays worth, so I’ve put the doubled amount in so I don’t have to double everything while I’m baking ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Jan
item.dc:creator: Jan
item.description: ooohh looks so yummy! will this recipe work just as well when the recipe is halved and baked in one tin? thanks!
item.content:encoded:
ooohh looks so yummy!
will this recipe work just as well when the recipe is halved and baked in one tin?
thanks!

item.title: By: Sarah
item.dc:creator: Sarah
item.description:
Just wanted to comment on my earlier comment:
Having watched 'Poh's Kitchen' on the ABC, I now know that it is important to properly beat the sugar and the eggs as otherwise they start to cook each other! So, listen to Anita and not to me!
item.content:encoded:
Just wanted to comment on my earlier comment:

Having watched ‘Poh’s Kitchen’ on the ABC, I now know that it is important to properly beat the sugar and the eggs as otherwise they start to cook each other! So, listen to Anita and not to me!

item.title: By: Sarah

item.description: I only just realised that this was a double recipe! You sweet-tooth! :)
item.content:encoded: I only just realised that this was a double recipe! You sweet-tooth! ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Maria@TheGourmetChallenge
item.dc:creator: Maria@TheGourmetChallenge
item.description: Perfect brownies, cracked top and fudgy middle! I would have to triple the recipe, because I would defiantely eat a batch all to myself! Brownie hoover sitting right here!
item.content:encoded: Perfect brownies, cracked top and fudgy middle! I would have to triple the recipe, because I would defiantely eat a batch all to myself! Brownie hoover sitting right here!

item.title: By: sarah
item.dc:creator: sarah
item.description:
Yay! This recipe is finally up!
This is SUCH a good recipe - I shamelessly requested it from Anita and cook it at least every fortnight. I only use a fork to combine the eggs, sugar and vanilla,i find that that makes the brownie more fudgey.
AND it is just as good with out choc-chips if my pantry is ever a bit lacking on the chocolate front :)
item.content:encoded:
Yay! This recipe is finally up!

This is SUCH a good recipe – I shamelessly requested it from Anita and cook it at least every fortnight. I only use a fork to combine the eggs, sugar and vanilla,i find that that makes the brownie more fudgey.

AND it is just as good with out choc-chips if my pantry is ever a bit lacking on the chocolate front ðŸ™‚
